forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 4am, then a slight chance of rain between 4am and 5am, then a slight chance of thunderstorms and a slight chance of rain. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 51. Northeast wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of thunderstorms and a slight chance of rain before 8am, then rain and a chance of thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. High near 74, with temperatures falling to around 70 in the afternoon. Southeast wind 3 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain and a slight chance of thunderstorms before 2am. Cloudy. Low around 46, with temperatures rising to around 48 overnight. West wind 3 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between three quarters and one inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a high near 52. North northwest wind 12 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain And Snow Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 8am, then a slight chance of rain and snow showers between 8am and 2pm. Mostly sunny, with a high near 54. North wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
